alert.note: Alert for Freeborn; Steele (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 12 at 10:16PM CDT until April 12 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR FREEBORN AND SOUTHERN STEELE COUNTIES... At 1016 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ellendale to Albert Lea to near Twin Lakes, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Albert Lea, Blooming Prairie, Clarks Grove, Ellendale, Glenville, Geneva, Emmons, London, Hollandale, Hayward, Twin Lakes and Myrtle. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central Minnesota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
